devdoc.details: Token router send to liquidity to the Uniswap V3 pool in exchange for      an LP-NFT

SafeCastOverflowedIntToUint(int256).details: An int value doesn't fit in an uint of `bits` size.

SafeCastOverflowedUintToInt(uint256).details: An uint value doesn't fit in an int of `bits` size.

SafeERC20FailedOperation(address).details: An operation with an ERC-20 token failed.

LpNftCollected(address,address,address,a.details: Emitted when liquidity and fees are collected from an LP-NFT.

params.assetTokenAddress: The address of the asset token
params.assetTokenCollected: The amount of asset token fees collected
params.assetTokenReturned: The amount of the asset token returned to the        recipient
params.gameTokenAddress: The address of the game token
params.gameTokenCollected: The amount of game token fees collected
params.liquidityAmount: The amount of liquidity in the NFT before collection
params.nftAddress: The address of the NFT manager contract
params.recipient: The address of the recipient of the LP-NFT fees
params.sender: The sender of the collection request

LpNftMinted(address,address,address,addr.details: Emitted when an LP-NFT is minted

params.assetTokenAddress: The address of the asset token
params.assetTokenShare: The amount of the asset token in the NFT
params.gameTokenAddress: The address of the game token
params.gameTokenShare: The amount of the game token in the NFT
params.nftAddress: The address of the NFT manager contract
params.recipient: The address of the recipient of the LP-NFT
params.sender: The sender of the assets being paid

params.pow5StablePool_: The address of the Uniswap V3 pool contract
params.pow5Token_: The address of the POW5 token
params.stableToken_: The address of the stable token
params.uniswapV3NftManager_: The address of the upstream Uniswap V3 NFT        manager

uniswapV3SwapCallback(int256,int256,byte.details: See {IUniswapV3SwapCallback-uniswapV3SwapCallback} This function is called to the sender after a swap is executed on Uniswap V3. The pool tokens owed for the swap must be payed. The caller of this method must be checked to be a UniswapV3Pool deployed by the canonical UniswapV3Factory. amount0Delta and amount1Delta can both be 0 if no tokens were swapped.
